Origin cd stereo.
Joint stereo : >>Where is the deep bass?????? >>>>>> This joint stereo!!!!!!!

These were mono recordings at the time. Made Joint stereo for the CDs as few have mono players.
To give a stereo-sounding playback. You can't make stereo from a mono recording, only tweak it a little for a better sound. That's what's on the CDs.
